name: CTA Bus Tracker
description: The Bus Tracker API provides a gateway into near-real-time CTA bus locations and estimated arrival times. You can use the official CTA Bus Tracker service via Web or mobile device. To use this API, you must agree to the Terms of Service and apply for a key. You'll also need a Bus Tracker account.
